bugs.summary: Add basic plumbing for downloading Widevine L1 plugins
very bad precision in calculations involving CSS units vw and vh
Add a micro-benchmark for the intl::mozilla::LineBreaker API.
be more strict with Date.parse('YYYY-MM-D'), don't treat it as ISO 8601 and don't generate a UTC Date
Throw an error if setTimeZone is given an invalid time zone
Fallback rendering for small-caps can fail if the font lacks capital letters
SandboxFilter.cpp: extra ';' after member function definition
glib warning "Failed to create DBus proxy for org.freedesktop.UPower"
Extend ESLint rule mozilla/reject-importGlobalProperties to reject imports in sjs files
[MSIX] Allow to use Windows UserChoice default mechanisms for MSIX packages
[Easy Setup Feature] - Clean up test cases and unused logic
Autoplay settings text for allowed or blocked status overflows due to narrow column width
Use a single-process model for the translations engine
